it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.netstack

Class LossyIpInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.NetInterface
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.netstack.LossyIpInterface

  • public class LossyIpInterface
extends NetInterface
    Lossy and slow interface.

    It adds a delay and packet loss probability to the sent/received packets. The two directions (send and receive) can be configured separately.

        public LossyIpInterface(NetInterface net_interface,
                        long delay,

        Creates a new interface.
        Parameters:
        net_interface - the network interface
        delay - mean delay in nanoseconds
        loss - loss probability

      • LossyIpInterface

        public LossyIpInterface(NetInterface net_interface,
                        long send_delay,
                        double send_loss,
                        long recv_delay,
                        double recv_loss)
        Creates a new interface.
        Parameters:
        net_interface - the network interface
        send_delay - mean delay for outgoing packets in nanoseconds
        send_loss - loss probability for outgoing packets
        recv_delay - mean delay for incoming packets in nanoseconds
        recv_loss - loss probability for incoming packets
